column4: hi trying to compile an app and am getting: configure: error: no acceptable C compiler found in $PATH  but I have gcc installed, and g++ (according to synaptic)
i ran into that the other day..gcc-VersionNumber was available, but the ./configure script was looking for 'gcc'..so symlinking gcc to the version solved that problem
that particular command would require root privs, so yes.
did you happen to get this error as well? configure: error: unable to find the GTK+ library
